layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,8) size 784x584
      LayoutBlockFlow (anonymous) at (0,0) size 784x20
        LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 214x19
          text run at (0,0) width 214: "the lower left cell should be colored"
      LayoutTable {TABLE} at (0,20) size 31x56 [border: (1px outset #808080)]
        LayoutTableSection {TBODY} at (1,1) size 29x54
          LayoutTableRow {TR} at (0,2) size 29x24

                text run at (2,2) width 7: "a"

              LayoutText {#text} at (2,2) size 8x19
                text run at (2,2) width 8: "b"
